doc.description:
Hovers the drone based on optical flow made for Linux video Devices.
Computes Pitch- and roll attide from downward looking camera looking at a textured floor. - Sonar is required. - Controller can hold position

define.name: PHI_PGAIN
define.description: Optic flow proportional gain on the roll velocity error

define.name: PHI_IGAIN
define.description: Optic flow integrated gain on the summed roll velocity error

define.name: THETA_PGAIN
define.description: Optic flow proportional gain on the pitch velocity error

define.name: THETA_IGAIN
define.description: Optic flow integrated gain on the summed pitch velocity error

define.name: DESIRED_VX
define.description: The desired velocity in the body frame x direction

define.name: DESIRED_VY
define.description: The desired velocity in the body frame y direction

define.name: AGL_ID
define.description: ABI sender id for AGL message (sonar measurement) (default: ABI_BROADCAST)

define.name: DEVICE
define.description: The V4L2 camera device that is used for the calculations

define.name: DEVICE_SIZE
define.description: The V4L2 camera device width and height

define.name: DEVICE_BUFFERS
define.description: Amount of V4L2 video buffers

define.name: SUBDEV
define.description: The V4L2 subdevice to initialize before the main device

define.name: FOV_W
define.description: The field of view width of the bottom camera (Defaults are from an ARDrone 2)

define.name: FOV_H
define.description: The field of view height of the bottom camera (Defaults are from an ARDrone 2)

define.name: FX
define.description: Field in the x direction of the camera (Defaults are from an ARDrone 2)

define.name: FY
define.description: Field in the y direction of the camera (Defaults are from an ARDrone 2)

define.name: MAX_TRACK_CORNERS
define.description: The maximum amount of corners the Lucas Kanade algorithm is tracking between two frames

define.name: WINDOW_SIZE
define.description: Window size used in Lucas Kanade algorithm

define.name: SUBPIXEL_FACTOR
define.description: Amount of subpixels per pixel, used for more precise (subpixel) calculations of the flow

define.name: MAX_ITERATIONS
define.description: Maximum number of iterations the Lucas Kanade algorithm should take

define.name: THRESHOLD_VEC
define.description: TThreshold in subpixels when the iterations of Lucas Kanade should stop

define.name: FAST9_ADAPTIVE
define.description: Whether we should use and adapative FAST9 crner detection threshold

define.name: FAST9_THRESHOLD
define.description: FAST9 default threshold

define.name: FAST9_MIN_DISTANCE
define.description: The amount of pixels between corners that should be detected

makefile.raw:
VIEWVIDEO_HOST ?= $(MODEM_HOST) VIEWVIDEO_PORT_OUT ?= 5000 VIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST ?= $(MODEM_BROADCAST)
VIEWVID_CFLAGS = -DVIEWVIDEO_HOST=$(VIEWVIDEO_HOST) -DVIEWVIDEO_PORT_OUT=$(VIEWVIDEO_PORT_OUT) ifeq ($(VIEWVIDEO_USE_NC),) ap.CFLAGS += $(VIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DVIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST=$(VIEWVIDEO_BROADCAST) else ap.CFLAGS += $(VIEWVID_CFLAGS) -DVIEWVIDEO_USE_NC endif
ap.CFLAGS += -DGUIDANCE_V_MODE_MODULE_SETTING=GUIDANCE_V_MODE_HOVER ap.CFLAGS += -DGUIDANCE_H_MODE_MODULE_SETTING=GUIDANCE_H_MODE_MODULE
